meanings.definition: The quality or state of being material.
meanings.sent1: The materialnesses of the object made it feel solid and real.
meanings.sent2: The artist focused on capturing the materialnesses of the clay sculpture.
meanings.sent3: The materialnesses of the ghost costume made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a materialnesses that resonated with the audience.
meanings.sent5: The materialnesses of the mountain was awe-inspiring.

meanings.definition: The physical substance of which a thing is made.
meanings.sent1: The materialnesses of the cake was rich chocolate.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter selected the finest wood for the materialnesses of the table.
meanings.sent3: The materialnesses of the clouds looked like fluffy cotton candy.
meanings.sent4: His words had a weighty materialnesses that couldn't be ignored.
meanings.sent5: The materialnesses of the rock was smooth and cool to the touch.

meanings.definition: Relevant or important information or facts.
meanings.sent1: The lawyer emphasized the materialnesses of the case during the trial.
meanings.sent2: In research papers, it is crucial to cite the materialnesses accurately.
meanings.sent3: The materialnesses of the gossip spread quickly through the office.
meanings.sent4: The materialnesses of history shape our understanding of the present.
meanings.sent5: She always focuses on the materialnesses of a situation before making a decision.
